languages.text: {n}Плитки разлетаются по столу, складываясь в стопки перед игроками. Вы внезапно ощущаете тяжесть в теле — коварный амасек медленно отвоевывает у вас ясность мыслей и легкость движений.{/n}

{n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Плитки разлетаются по столу, складываясь в стопки перед игроками. Вы внезапно ощущаете тяжесть в теле — коварный амасек медленно отвоевывает у вас ясность мыслей и легкость движений.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

{n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

{n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

{n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

languages.text: {n}坦塔卢牌散落在桌上，每位玩家面前都摆着几张牌。突然之间，你感觉身体变得沉重起来。艾玛赛克酒的酒劲上来了，你感觉脑子变得越来越迟钝，手也变得越来越笨拙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}坦塔卢牌散落在桌上，每位玩家面前都摆着几张牌。突然之间，你感觉身体变得沉重起来。艾玛赛克酒的酒劲上来了，你感觉脑子变得越来越迟钝，手也变得越来越笨拙。{/n}

languages.text: {n}タイルはテーブルの周りに散らばり、各プレイヤーの前に山を作っている。あなたは突然、体が重くなるのを感じる。背徳的なアマセックは、あなたの明晰な思考力と器用さを徐々に奪っていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}タイルはテーブルの周りに散らばり、各プレイヤーの前に山を作っている。あなたは突然、体が重くなるのを感じる。背徳的なアマセックは、あなたの明晰な思考力と器用さを徐々に奪っていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las fichas se dispersan por la mesa, formando montones delante de cada jugador. De pronto notas cierta pesadez en tu cuerpo. El traicionero amasec te está arrebatando la claridad mental y la destreza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las fichas se dispersan por la mesa, formando montones delante de cada jugador. De pronto notas cierta pesadez en tu cuerpo. El traicionero amasec te está arrebatando la claridad mental y la destreza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les tuiles sont distribuées autour de la table, formant des piles devant chaque joueur. Soudain, votre corps vous semble plus lourd ; l'insidieux amasec vous prive peu à peu de votre acuité mentale et de votre dextérité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les tuiles sont distribuées autour de la table, formant des piles devant chaque joueur. Soudain, votre corps vous semble plus lourd ; l'insidieux amasec vous prive peu à peu de votre acuité mentale et de votre dextérité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Steine werden auf dem Tisch verteilt und bilden vor jedem Spieler einen kleinen Stapel. Plötzlich fühlt sich dein Körper schwer an – der tückische Amasec sorgt langsam dafür, dass du nicht mehr klar denken kannst und dir dein Geschick abhandenkommt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Steine werden auf dem Tisch verteilt und bilden vor jedem Spieler einen kleinen Stapel. Plötzlich fühlt sich dein Körper schwer an – der tückische Amasec sorgt langsam dafür, dass du nicht mehr klar denken kannst und dir dein Geschick abhandenkommt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karolar, masaya dağılıp her oyuncunun önüne yığılmış durumda. Aniden bedeninin ağırlaştığını hissediyorsun. Hain amasek, yavaş yavaş düşüncelerini ve hareketlerinin hâkimiyetini elinden alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Tiles are dispersed around the table, forming piles in front of each player. You suddenly feel your body grow heavy — the treacherous amasec is slowly robbing you of your clarity of thought and dexterity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Karolar masaya dağılmış ve her oyuncunun önüne yığılmış durumda. Aniden bedeninin ağırlaştığını hissediyorsun. O hain amasek yavaş yavaş düşüncelerini ve hareketlerinin hakimiyetini elinden alıyor.{/n}
